ValidationRule.description: Requires a reason for not subscribing when sub-stage is changing to pending client feedback
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( Sub_Stage__c ) && ISPICKVAL( Sub_Stage__c , 'Pending Client Feedback') && ISBLANK(TEXT( Reason_for_Not_Subscribing__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reason for Not Subscribing is required prior to changing sub-stage to Pending Client Feedback
